main event: Three lights were observed moving at high speed by two aircraft pilots at high altitude.
interesting points: The lights were described as resembling flares or tracer bullets.
The lights moved at angles to each other and disappeared at great speed.
The report mentions the possibility of the lights being a balloon.
Another report mentions an object observed moving fast from northwest to southeast, making 12-degree turns and maneuvering at very high speed before disappearing from sight after 2-3 minutes.
A third report references a previous message and requests the correct time of sighting, with the time of the sighting being reported as 2224 GMT and the light disappearing from sight at 2333 GMT.
sighted object: three fast-moving lights, described as resembling flares or tracer bullets
